TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceCacheDurationConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供能将 32 位带符号整数对象与数据源控件缓存持续时间表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持通常缓存的 ASP.NET 数据源控件提供`CacheDuration`属性，你可以设置为的秒数控件会缓存数据。ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data. 值 0 表示"无限"在这些缓存上下文，和类负责此显式转换。The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the class takes care of this explicit conversion. 不使用网页开发人员类。Page developers do not use the class. 控件开发人员要开发支持缓存的数据源控件使用此类型转换器连同特性修饰表示缓存持续时间设置的一个自定义数据源控件的属性。Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何用修饰支持缓存的数据源控件的属性属性。The following code example demonstrates how you can decorate a property on a data source control that supports caching with a attribute. 在此示例中，数据源控件支持缓存的语义，并公开三个建模后其他 ASP.NET 数据源控件的属性： `EnableCaching`， `CacheDuration`，和`CacheExpirationPolicy`。In this example, the data source control supports caching semantics and exposes three properties modeled after other ASP.NET data source controls: `EnableCaching`, `CacheDuration`, and `CacheExpirationPolicy`. `CacheDuration`属性使用类型转换器。The `CacheDuration` property uses the type converter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/CS/somedatasourcecdc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/VB/somedatasourcecdc.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类始终返回`false`，则指示从返回的集合方法不是可能的值的穷举列表。The class always returns `false` to indicate that the collection returned from the method is not an exhaustive list of possible values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象始终返回`true`，则指示应调用方法以查找该转换器的一组公共值的支持。The object always returns `true` to indicate that the method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
